name: Nazca Ventures
tag_list: internet, technology, consumer-internet, mobile, saas, enterprise-software, online-and-mobile-advertising, e-payments, e-commerce, marketplaces, education-and-media
description: Early stage fund for Latin America
overview:
Nazca Ventures is the first regional early-stage venture capital fund tailored for Latin American entrepreneurs. NAzca Ventures selects the companies with the greatest potential for regionalization and provides them with acceleration services.

It´s focus is technology: consumer internet, mobile, SaaS, enterprise software, online and mobile advertising, e-payments, e-commerce, marketplaces, education and media.

Nazca Ventures invests in startups that comply with the following funding criteria: (1) Are based in Latin America (2) Are working in the technology space: consumer internet, mobile, SaaS, enterprise software, online and mobile advertising,-payments, e-commerce, marketplaces, education and media. (3) Have a working prototype/ demo. (4) Have sales or are in the process of making them. (5) Want to create a regional business.

Nazca Ventures provides access to entrepreneurs and top experts. Many of them may eventually become part of the Board of Advisors for your company Nazca Ventures provides startups with networks to facilitate a smooth and accelerated expansion of the company into other Latin American countries. Nazca Ventures invests between USD150k and USD750k to help you concentrate on growing your business and become regional.
